section.name: Sponsors
section.p: As with many open source projects, DbUnit has to thank not only the developer and the user communities but some supporting companies too, as they provide us licenses, bandwidth, space, and all sorts of things that usually you have to pay for.
The following organizations currently support dbUnit.

ul.li: SourceForge provides us the web space, source control, and all other tools in its great platform
Intertech Consulting and Training hosts our CI builds at http://dbunit.intertech.com/jenkins

section.p: To all of them our sincere thanks for their support!
